Blacksmith of Wind Rooney:
It was quite entertaining...
I long worked and I managed to make toty, possessing strength of dragons.
Depending on a combination it is possible to enclose in it different effects, but such device only in places where strength of dragons operates will work...
There are 4 varieties totems. But they can be combined. The following varieties are at present available:
"Totem of Body"
"Totem of Spirit"
"Totem of Fortitude"
"Totem of Courage"
